WorkItem.Description:
I've tried it but couldn't resolve the issue relating to consuming secured java web service (CRM On Demand) in .net. Please share some sample relating to the subject so that I can solve the problem.  The WSDL is attached to this thread.
 
The documentation says:
NOTE: For Administrative Services APIs only, the following login option is supported for stateless
Web services requests.
■ UserName and Password provided in SOAP security header (using WSSE Draft Namespace)
WorkItem.Summary: Secured Java Web Service Client in .Net
